languages.text: "Не знаю, имеет ли это значение, но, возможно вам стоит знать. После падения Кьявы Гамма дела у рода Гапрак шли, мягко говоря, скверно. Они искали способы наладить свою жизнь и влияние, в том числе и при помощи других знатных домов. К нам они не обращались — сами понимаете, зазорно искать помощь у тех, кого считаешь ниже себя. Но возможно, семьи Драйвстем или Зауэрбэк смогут рассказать вам об этом больше".

traits.locale_text: "Не знаю, имеет ли это значение, но, возможно вам стоит знать. После падения Кьява-Гаммы дела у рода Гапрак шли, мягко говоря, скверно. Они искали способы наладить свою жизнь и влияние, в том числе и при помощи других знатных домов. К нам они не обращались — сами понимаете, зазорно искать помощь у тех, кого не принимаешь. Но возможно, семьи Драйвстем или Зауэрбек смогут рассказать вам об этом больше".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "I am not sure if it is relevant, but perhaps you should know: since the fall of Kiava Gamma, House Gaprak has been faring poorly, to say the least. They have been looking for ways to enhance their influence and to improve their lot, including asking for help from the other noble houses. They have not approached us, of course — it is shameful to seek help from those you consider your inferiors, you understand. But perhaps the Drivestems or the Sauerbacks can tell you more about this matter."
languages.original_text: "Не знаю, имеет ли это значение, но, возможно вам стоит знать. После падения Кьявы Гамма дела у рода Гапрак шли, мягко говоря, скверно. Они искали способы наладить свою жизнь и влияние, в том числе и при помощи других знатных домов. К нам они не обращались — сами понимаете, зазорно искать помощь у тех, кого считаешь ниже себя. Но возможно, семьи Драйвстем или Зауэрбэк смогут рассказать вам об этом больше".

traits.locale_text: "I am not sure if it is of any significance, but perhaps you should know. After the fall of Kiava Gamma, House Gaprak had been feeling under the weather, to put it lightly. They were looking for ways to enhance their influence and to make their lives better — including asking help the other noble houses. They did not turn to us, of course — you understand that it is shameful to seek help from those you consider to be inferior. But perhaps the Drivestems or the Sauerbacks can tell you more about this matter.
traits.speaker: Clemence

They have been looking for ways to enhance their influence and to improve their lot, including asking for help from the other noble houses. They have not approached us, of course — it is shameful to seek help from those you consider your inferiors, you understand. But perhaps the Drivestems or the Sauerbacks can tell you more about this matter."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「関係あるかどうかはわかりませんが、お知らせしておく方がいいでしょう。キアヴァ・ガンマ崩壊後、ギャプラック家は、控えめに言っても、不振を極めています。その影響力を高め、良い暮らしをするために、他の貴族家に援助を求めることもありました。もちろん、ウェルザリアン家を頼ることはありませんでした。ご存知のとおり、劣っているとみなす相手に助力を請うのは恥ですから。ですが、ドライブステン家かザウアーバック家ならこの件について多くを語れるのではないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "I am not sure if it is relevant, but perhaps you should know: since the fall of Kiava Gamma, House Gaprak has been faring poorly, to say the least. They have been looking for ways to enhance their influence and to improve their lot, including asking for help from the other noble houses. They have not approached us, of course — it is shameful to seek help from those you consider your inferiors, you understand. But perhaps the Drivestems or the Sauerbacks can tell you more about this matter."

traits.locale_text: 「関係あるかどうかはわかりませんが、お知らせしておく方がいいでしょう。キアヴァ・ガンマが落ちた後のギャプラック家は、控えめに言っても、曇天の心地で過ごしていました。その影響力を高め、良い暮らしをするために、他の貴族家に援助を求めることもありました。もちろん、ウェルザリアン家を頼ることはありませんでした。ご存知のとおり、劣っているとみなす相手に助力を請うのは恥ですから。ですが、ドライブステン家かザウアーバック家ならこの件について多くを語れるのではないでしょうか」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “我不知道这两件事是否有所关联，但您可以作为参考。在基亚瓦伽马星陨落之后，哪怕是说得好听点，贾帕克家族也一直相当不顺。他们想方设法扩张势力、改善生活，也曾向其他贵族家族求助。当然，他们没来找过我们，如您所知，这些贵族不会轻易向‘下等人’低头。不过，德莱夫斯塔家族或苏尔贝克家族或许能为您提供更多线索。”
languages.original_text: "I am not sure if it is relevant, but perhaps you should know: since the fall of Kiava Gamma, House Gaprak has been faring poorly, to say the least. They have been looking for ways to enhance their influence and to improve their lot, including asking for help from the other noble houses. They have not approached us, of course — it is shameful to seek help from those you consider your inferiors, you understand. But perhaps the Drivestems or the Sauerbacks can tell you more about this matter."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道这两件事是否有所关联，但您可以作为参考。在基亚瓦伽马星陨落之后，哪怕是说得好听点，贾帕克家族也一直相当不顺。他们想方设法扩张势力、改善生活，也曾向其他贵族家族求助。当然，他们没来找过我们，如您所知，这些贵族不会轻易向‘下等人’低头。不过，德莱夫斯塔家族或苏尔贝克家族或许能为您提供更多线索。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas si ce sera pertinent, mais je pense que vous devez savoir que depuis la chute de Kiava Gamma, la maison Gaprak est pour ainsi dire dans la tourmente. Je sais de source sûre qu'ils ont cherché à étendre leur influence et à sortir la tête de l'eau, et que pour ce faire, ils n'ont pas hésité à demander de l'aide des autres maisons nobles. Sauf la nôtre, bien sûr. Requérir l'aide d'une maison qu'ils considèrent comme inférieure jetterait l'opprobre sur leur famille, j'imagine. Mais les Drivestem ou les Sauerback pourraient peut-être vous en dire plus. »
languages.original_text: "I am not sure if it is relevant, but perhaps you should know: since the fall of Kiava Gamma, House Gaprak has been faring poorly, to say the least. They have been looking for ways to enhance their influence and to improve their lot, including asking for help from the other noble houses. They have not approached us, of course — it is shameful to seek help from those you consider your inferiors, you understand. But perhaps the Drivestems or the Sauerbacks can tell you more about this matter."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas si ce sera pertinent, mais je pense que vous devez savoir. Depuis la chute de Kiava Gamma, la maison Gaprak est dans la tourmente, pour ainsi dire. Je sais de source sûre qu'ils ont cherché à étendre leur influence et à sortir la tête de l'eau, et que pour ce faire, ils n'ont pas hésité à demander de l'aide des autres maisons nobles. Sauf à nous, évidemment. Requérir l'aide d'une maison qu'ils considèrent comme inférieure jetterait l'opprobre sur leur famille, j'imagine. Mais les Drivestem ou les Sauerback pourraient peut-être vous en dire plus. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «No sé si será relevante, pero creo que debería saberlo. Tras la caída de Kiava Gamma, la casa Gaprak estaba hundida, por no decir otra cosa. Han estado buscando formas de aumentar su influencia y de mejorar sus vidas, entre ellas, pedir ayuda a las demás casas nobles. Por supuesto, no acudieron a nosotros; sería demasiado vergonzoso pedir ayuda a quienes consideran inferiores, como puede imaginar. Tal vez los Drivestem o los Sauerback puedan contarle más».
languages.original_text: "I am not sure if it is relevant, but perhaps you should know: since the fall of Kiava Gamma, House Gaprak has been faring poorly, to say the least. They have been looking for ways to enhance their influence and to improve their lot, including asking for help from the other noble houses. They have not approached us, of course — it is shameful to seek help from those you consider your inferiors, you understand. But perhaps the Drivestems or the Sauerbacks can tell you more about this matter."

traits.locale_text: «No sé si será relevante, pero creo que debería saberlo. Tras la caída de Kiava Gamma, la casa Gaprak estaba hundida, por no decir otra cosa. Buscaban formas de aumentar su influencia y de mejorar sus vidas, entre ellas, pedir ayuda a las demás casas nobles. Por supuesto, no acudieron a nosotros. Sería demasiado vergonzoso pedir ayuda a quienes consideran inferiores. Tal vez los Drivestem o los Sauerback puedan contarle más».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, ob es relevant ist, aber Ihr solltet es wohl wissen: Seit dem Fall von Kiava Gamma ergeht es Haus Gaprak schlecht, gelinde gesagt. Sie suchen nach Wegen, ihren Einfluss zu mehren und wieder auf einen grünen Zweig zu kommen. Sie haben auch die anderen Adelshäuser um Hilfe gebeten. Uns natürlich nicht, versteht sich. Es wäre ja eine Schande, Hilfe von jemandem zu erbitten, den man als weniger würdig ansieht. Aber vielleicht können die Drivestems und Sauerbacks Euch etwas dazu sagen."
languages.original_text: "I am not sure if it is relevant, but perhaps you should know: since the fall of Kiava Gamma, House Gaprak has been faring poorly, to say the least. They have been looking for ways to enhance their influence and to improve their lot, including asking for help from the other noble houses. They have not approached us, of course — it is shameful to seek help from those you consider your inferiors, you understand. But perhaps the Drivestems or the Sauerbacks can tell you more about this matter."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, ob es relevant ist, aber Ihr solltet es wohl wissen. Seit dem Fall von Kiava Gamma geht es Haus Gaprak nicht sonderlich gut, vorsichtig ausgedrückt. Sie suchen nach Wegen, ihren Einfluss zu mehren und wieder auf einen grünen Zweig zu kommen. Sie haben auch die anderen Adelshäuser um Hilfe gebeten. An uns haben sie sich natürlich nicht gewandt. Es wäre ja eine Schande, Hilfe von jemandem zu erbitten, den man für weniger würdig hält. Aber vielleicht können die Drivestems und Sauerbacks Euch etwas dazu sagen.
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Konuyla ilgisinden emin olmasam da bilmeniz gereken bir husus var: Kiava Gama düştüğünden beri Gaprak Hanesi'nin durumu en hafif tabirle kötüleşti. O günden bu yana nüfuzlarını artırıp durumlarını düzeltmeye çabalıyorlar. Bunun için diğer hanelerden yardım istedikleri de oldu. Tabii bunlar arasında biz yoktuk. Kendilerini bizden iyi gördükleri için utanılası bir hareket olurdu. Bu hususla ilgili olarak Drivestem ve Sauerback hanelerinden daha çok bilgi edinebilmeniz muhtemel."
languages.original_text: "I am not sure if it is relevant, but perhaps you should know: since the fall of Kiava Gamma, House Gaprak has been faring poorly, to say the least. They have been looking for ways to enhance their influence and to improve their lot, including asking for help from the other noble houses. They have not approached us, of course — it is shameful to seek help from those you consider your inferiors, you understand. But perhaps the Drivestems or the Sauerbacks can tell you more about this matter."

traits.locale_text: "Konuyla ilgisinden emin olmsasam da bilmeniz gereken bir husus var: Kiava Gama düştüğünden beri Gaprak Hanesi'nin durumu en hafif tabirle kötüleşti. O günden bu yana nüfuzlarını arttırmak ve durumlarını düzeltmek için çabalıyorlar. Bunun için diğer hanelerden yardım da istedikleri oldu. Tabii biz bu hanelerden biri değildik. Kendilerini bizden iyi gördükleri için bundan utanırlardı. Ancak bu konuyla ilgili Drivestem ve Sauerback hanelerinden daha çok bilgi edinebilmeniz muhtemel."
traits.speaker: Clemence
